for the pooled credit line","shares":"shares withdrawn by lender from interest accrued by yield as well as supplied by borrower","user":"address of the lender"}},"Lend(uint256,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"amount of tokens lent by user","id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","user":"address of the user"}},"Liquidated(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"collateralLiquidated":"amount of collateral that is received after liquidation","id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"LiquidationWithdrawn(uint256,address,uint256)":{"params":{"collateralShare":"share of collateral withdrawn by lender from liquidation","id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","user":"address of the lender"}},"WithdrawLiquidity(uint256,address,uint256)":{"params":{"id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","shares":"amount of shares of liquidity provided initially by lender withdrawn","user":"address of the lender"}},"WithdrawLiquidityOnCancel(uint256,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"amount of tokens lent by the user which is withdrawn on pooled credit line cancellation","id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","user":"address of the lender"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address."},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length."},"borrowed(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"only pooledCreditLineContract can invoke","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","_sharesBorrowed":"amount of shares borrowed"}},"calculatePrincipalWithdrawable(uint256,address)":{"params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","_lender":"lender whose share of principal is to be withdrawn"},"returns":{"_0":"Principal withdrawable"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_pooledCreditLine":"address of pooled credit line contract","_savingsAccount":"address of savings account contract","_verification":"address of verification contract"}},"create(uint256,address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bool)":{"details":"only pooled credit line can call the create function","params":{"_areTokensTransferable":"boolean that represents if pool tokens for credit line are transferable","_borrowAsset":"address of token that is being lent by lenders & borrowed by borrower","_borrowAssetStrategy":"address of strategy to deposit lent tokens to savings account","_borrowLimit":"max tokens that was requested by borrower","_collectionPeriod":"time for which tokens can be lent to pooled credit lines","_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","_lenderVerifier":"address of verifier with which lenders should be verified to lend","_minBorrowAmount":"min tokens that was requested by borrower"}},"getLenderInfo(uint256,address)":{"params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","_lender":"address of the lender for which query is made"},"returns":{"_0":"returns lender info"}},"getLenderInterestWithdrawable(uint256,address)":{"details":"it is a view function as far as the Pooled credit lines are concerned and doesn't  make any state changes except for getSharesForTokens and getTokensForShares in yield","params":{"_lender":"address of lender for whom interest is withdrawn"}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-isApprovedForAll}."},"lend(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"lent amount is deposited to savings account only once borrow limit is reached or if start is called","params":{"_amount":"amount of borrow tokens to lend","_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"liquidate(uint256,bool)":{"details":"only one of the lenders can liquidate their pooled credit line","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","_withdraw":"flag used to identify if lender's share of liquidated collateral and liquidity (amount lent + interest) is also withdrawn"}},"repaid(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"only pooledCreditLineContract can invoke","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","_interestShares":"interest in shares repaid","_sharesRepaid":"shares repaid"}},"requestCancelled(uint256)":{"details":"only pooledCreditLineContract can invoke","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeBatchTransferFrom}."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeTransferFrom}."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-setApprovalForAll}."},"start(uint256)":{"details":"this function needs to be called by the borrower","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas."},"terminate(uint256,address)":{"details":"only pooledCreditLineContract can invoke","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line","_to":"address to which all the borrow tokens are transferred"}},"uri(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\\{id\\}` substring with the actual token type ID."},"withdrawInterest(uint256)":{"details":"Tokens lent are locked till end of Pooled Credit line.  Any interest paid by borrower can be withdrawn by lenders proportional to their token balances for that pooled credit line. Partial withdrawal of interest is not allowed. Whenever they call the `withdrawInterest` function they will get the entire amount of interest that is owed to them by that time","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"withdrawLiquidity(uint256)":{"details":"Liquidity can be withdrawn when the pooled credit line in the following scenarios - pcl is cancelled by the borrower - pcl gets cancelled because because desired amount wasn't reached - pcl gets cancelled because it was never started by the borrower and endTime has reached - pcl is liquidated before the endTime has reached - pcl is liquidated after the endTime has reached - pcl is closed after all repayments in the other cases this function reverts","params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}},"withdrawTokensAfterLiquidation(uint256)":{"params":{"_id":"identifier for the pooled credit line"}}},"stateVariables":{"totalSupply":{"details":"Since ERC1155 tokens don't support the totalSupply function it is maintained here"}},"title":"Contract that deals with pooling of capital from lenders","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"InterestWithdrawn(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when interest by yield or/and borrower is withdrawn"},"Lend(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when lender deposits tokens for pooled credit line"},"Liquidated(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a pooled credit line is liquidated by a lender"},"LiquidationWithdrawn(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a lender withdraws their share of liquidation"},"LiquidityWithdrawn(uint256,address)":{"notice":"emitted when lender withdraws from pool of poole-credit-lines"},"WithdrawLiquidity(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when liquidity provided by lender is withdrawn when pool is not cancelled"},"WithdrawLiquidityOnCancel(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when liquidity provided by lender is withdrawn as pool is cancelled"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"POOLED_CREDIT_LINE()":{"notice":"address of pooled credit line"},"SAVINGS_ACCOUNT()":{"notice":"address of savings account"},"VERIFICATION()":{"notice":"address of verification module"},"borrowed(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Function invoked on borrow from the pooled credit line"},"calculatePrincipalWithdrawable(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Function that can be used to calculate principal withdrawable"},"constructor":{"notice":"constructor to initialize immutable global variables"},"create(uint256,address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"function invoked when creating pooled credit line"},"getLenderInfo(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Function used to get withdrawal info of a lender for a specific pooled credit line"},"getLenderInterestWithdrawable(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Function used to get interest withdrawable by a lender in pooled credit line. the interest this function returns is a sum of borrowerInterest + yieldInterest borrower interest is the interest paid by the borrower yield interest is the interest generated by the yield strategy"},"initialize()":{"notice":"initializes the contract in context of proxy"},"lend(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Function used by lenders to lend to pooled credit line"},"liquidate(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Function used to liquidate a pooled credit line"},"pooledCLConstants(uint256)":{"notice":"Mapping that stores constants for pooledCreditLine against it's id"},"pooledCLVariables(uint256)":{"notice":"Mapping that stores variables for pooledCreditLine against it's id"},"repaid(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Function invoked when repayment is done to pooled credit line"},"requestCancelled(uint256)":{"notice":"Function invoked when pooled credit line is cancelled"},"start(uint256)":{"notice":"function used to start the pooled credit line once the start time is reached"},"terminate(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Function invoked when pooled credit line is terminated by admin"},"totalSupply(uint256)":{"notice":"Mapping that stores total pooledCreditLine token supply against the creditLineId"},"withdrawInterest(uint256)":{"notice":"Function used to withdraw interest repaid by the borrower and the yield interest generated by the borrow assets deposited in the strategy"},"withdrawLiquidity(uint256)":{"notice":"Function to withdraw liquidity by lender"},"withdrawTokensAfterLiquidation(uint256)":{"notice":"Function used to withdraw lender's share of liquidated collateral and the borrowAsset"}},"notice":"Implements the functions related to lender balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line
identifier for the pooled credit line
params._lender: lender whose share of principal is to be withdrawn

params._pooledCreditLine: address of pooled credit line contract

create(uint256,address,address,address,u.details: only pooled credit line can call the create function

params._areTokensTransferable: boolean that represents if pool tokens for credit line are transferable
params._borrowAsset: address of token that is being lent by lenders & borrowed by borrower
params._borrowAssetStrategy: address of strategy to deposit lent tokens to savings account
params._borrowLimit: max tokens that was requested by borrower
params._collectionPeriod: time for which tokens can be lent to pooled credit lines
params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line
params._lenderVerifier: address of verifier with which lenders should be verified to lend
params._minBorrowAmount: min tokens that was requested by borrower

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line
params._lender: address of the lender for which query is made

getLenderInterestWithdrawable(uint256,ad.details: it is a view function as far as the Pooled credit lines are concerned and doesn't  make any state changes except for getSharesForTokens and getTokensForShares in yield

params._lender: address of lender for whom interest is withdrawn

lend(uint256,uint256).details: lent amount is deposited to savings account only once borrow limit is reached or if start is called

params._amount: amount of borrow tokens to lend
params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

liquidate(uint256,bool).details: only one of the lenders can liquidate their pooled credit line

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line
params._withdraw: flag used to identify if lender's share of liquidated collateral and liquidity (amount lent + interest) is also withdrawn

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line
identifier for the pooled credit line

start(uint256).details: this function needs to be called by the borrower

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line
params._to: address to which all the borrow tokens are transferred

uri(uint256).details: See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\{id\}` substring with the actual token type ID.

withdrawInterest(uint256).details: Tokens lent are locked till end of Pooled Credit line.  Any interest paid by borrower can be withdrawn by lenders proportional to their token balances for that pooled credit line. Partial withdrawal of interest is not allowed. Whenever they call the `withdrawInterest` function they will get the entire amount of interest that is owed to them by that time

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line

withdrawLiquidity(uint256).details: Liquidity can be withdrawn when the pooled credit line in the following scenarios - pcl is cancelled by the borrower - pcl gets cancelled because because desired amount wasn't reached - pcl gets cancelled because it was never started by the borrower and endTime has reached - pcl is liquidated before the endTime has reached - pcl is liquidated after the endTime has reached - pcl is closed after all repayments in the other cases this function reverts

params._id: identifier for the pooled credit line
identifier for the pooled credit line

borrowed(uint256,uint256).notice: Function invoked on borrow from the pooled credit line

calculatePrincipalWithdrawable(uint256,a.notice: Function that can be used to calculate principal withdrawable

constructor.notice: constructor to initialize immutable global variables

create(uint256,address,address,address,u.notice: function invoked when creating pooled credit line

getLenderInfo(uint256,address).notice: Function used to get withdrawal info of a lender for a specific pooled credit line

getLenderInterestWithdrawable(uint256,ad.notice: Function used to get interest withdrawable by a lender in pooled credit line. the interest this function returns is a sum of borrowerInterest + yieldInterest borrower interest is the interest paid by the borrower yield interest is the interest generated by the yield strategy

initialize().notice: initializes the contract in context of proxy

lend(uint256,uint256).notice: Function used by lenders to lend to pooled credit line

liquidate(uint256,bool).notice: Function used to liquidate a pooled credit line

pooledCLConstants(uint256).notice: Mapping that stores constants for pooledCreditLine against it's id

pooledCLVariables(uint256).notice: Mapping that stores variables for pooledCreditLine against it's id

repaid(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Function invoked when repayment is done to pooled credit line

requestCancelled(uint256).notice: Function invoked when pooled credit line is cancelled

start(uint256).notice: function used to start the pooled credit line once the start time is reached

terminate(uint256,address).notice: Function invoked when pooled credit line is terminated by admin

totalSupply(uint256).notice: Mapping that stores total pooledCreditLine token supply against the creditLineId

withdrawInterest(uint256).notice: Function used to withdraw interest repaid by the borrower and the yield interest generated by the borrow assets deposited in the strategy

withdrawLiquidity(uint256).notice: Function to withdraw liquidity by lender

withdrawTokensAfterLiquidation(uint256).notice: Function used to withdraw lender's share of liquidated collateral and the borrowAsset

@notice address of pooled credit line
@notice address of verification module
@notice Mapping that stores constants for pooledCreditLine against it's id
@notice Mapping that stores variables for pooledCreditLine against it's id

@notice Mapping that stores total pooledCreditLine token supply against the creditLineId
 @dev Since ERC1155 tokens don't support the totalSupply function it is maintained here
@notice Modifier that allows only pooled credit line to call a function
@notice initializes the contract in context of proxy
